recommendations: Isha Singh “It is tough to find professionals like Ayushi who not only help a candidate with processes but also take time out to help them identify and prioritize opportunities. Through the highs and lows of the process, Ayushi has provided the support and the motivation to push ahead. Right from informing me about opportunities, to the final offer confirmation, she has helped me with feedback and preparation. Can't thank her enough for all the support!”

Karamveer Arora “Ayushi is a thorough professional and is amazing at what she does. She understands the PE / VC market well and went the extra mile to help me prepare for my interviews. I am glad to have had the opportunity to interact with her.”
